import React,{useState,useRef,useEffect}from'react';import{queryGeminiAI}from'../services/aiService';import{processDocument}from'../services/documentService';import MessageItem from'./MessageItem';import LoadingIndicator from'./LoadingIndicator';import FileUpload from'./FileUpload';import ApiTester from'./ApiTester';// Make sure ApiTester.js is in the same folder as this file
